ygData.msgSnippet: get onto da boat to erudin, it s the closest place to buy em (unless they changed it). Qorona Mindbender of the Volition Guild, 26th lvl enchanter on
ygData.messageBody:
get onto da boat to erudin, it's the closest place to buy em (unless they
changed it).

Qorona Mindbender of the Volition Guild, 26th lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule
Qoronita, 5th level Erudite Enchantress on Cazic-Thule
